item.title: Bonds That Once Haunted Banks Are Now Juicing Profits
item.description: Banks are expecting a bump to their core banking income as older, lower-yielding bonds mature and can be reinvested at todayâ€™s far higher yields.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Slip; Investors Dig Into More Bank Earnings
item.description: The Nasdaq, S&P 500 and Dow industrials were pulled lower by declines in tech shares. Bank of America and Morgan Stanley said profit more than doubled...

item.title: American Express to Pay $230 Million in Fines for Aggressive Sales Practices
item.description: The Wall Street Journal had reported on a series of deceptive and strong-arm tactics the card company used to increase small business sign-ups.

item.title: Your Money in the New Trump Administration: Four Things to Watch
item.description: Taxes, crypto, student loans and mortgages might be in for big changes over the next four years.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Higher
item.description: Gold settled 1.2% higher and silver rose nearly 0.7%, with both metals up for three consecutive sessions.
